name: The Pit (itch) (NoahSmith23412, SAE Dominic Au)
description:
Made by NoahSmith23412 and SAE Dominic Au 

A short game about a person going through depression struggling through each day. The game consists of the player doing tasks around the house in the forms of minigames and talking to a friend. The game is made to subtly hint at how friends and family could help someone going through depression in the form of RUOK's suggested methods of helping. Ask if their ok, Listen, Encourage action, Check in.
